languages.text: {n}На мгновение на лице мужчины мелькают смешанные чувства.{/n} "Мы оба связаны долгом, {name}, и он важнее любых сердечных дел".
{n}A mix of emotions flashes across the man's face for a moment.{/n} "You and I are both bound by duty, {name}, and that takes precedence over any matters of the heart."
languages.original_text: {n}На мгновение на лице мужчины мелькают смешанные чувства.{/n} "Мы оба связаны долгом, {name}, и он важнее любых сердечных дел".

traits.locale_text: {n}Mixed feelings flash across the man's face for a moment.{/n} "You and I are both bound by duty, {name}, and that takes precedence over any matters of the heart."
{n}Mixed feelings flash across the man's face for a moment.{/n} "You and I are both bound by duty, {name}, and that takes precedence over any matters of the heart."
{n}A mix of emotions flashes across the man's face for a moment.{/n} "You and I are both bound by duty, {name}, and that takes precedence over any matters of the heart."
{n}A mix of emotions flashes across the man's face for a moment.{/n} "You and I are both bound by duty, {name}, and that takes precedence over any matters of the heart."

languages.text: {n}Una mezcla de emociones asoma fugazmente al rostro del Procurador.{/n} «Los dos nos debemos a nuestras obligaciones, {name}, y eso tiene prioridad sobre los asuntos del corazón».
languages.original_text: {n}A mix of emotions flashes across the man's face for a moment.{/n} "You and I are both bound by duty, {name}, and that takes precedence over any matters of the heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una mezcla de emociones asoma fugazmente al rostro del Procurador.{/n} «Los dos nos debemos a nuestras obligaciones, {name}, y eso tiene prioridad sobre los asuntos del corazón».

languages.text: {n}Le visage de l'homme est parcouru par une succession d'émotions.{/n} « Nous partageons un même devoir, {name}, et il doit passer avant les sentiments. »
languages.original_text: {n}A mix of emotions flashes across the man's face for a moment.{/n} "You and I are both bound by duty, {name}, and that takes precedence over any matters of the heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de l'homme est parcouru par une succession d'émotions.{/n} « Nous partageons un même devoir, {name}, et il doit passer avant les sentiments. »

languages.text: {n}Adamın suratında bir anlığına türlü duygular belirip kayboluyor.{/n} "İkimiz de görevlerimize zincirliyiz {name}. Bu da kalbin her türlü arzusundan üstündür."
languages.original_text: {n}A mix of emotions flashes across the man's face for a moment.{/n} "You and I are both bound by duty, {name}, and that takes precedence over any matters of the heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adamın suratında bir anlığına türlü duygular belirip kayboluyor.{/n} "İkimiz de görevlerimize zincirliyiz {name}. Bu da kalbin her türlü arzusundan üstündür."

languages.text: {n}一时间，种种复杂的感情从索罗蒙脸上一闪而过。{/n}“你我都受责任约束，{name}，这比一切感情问题都更重要。”
languages.original_text: {n}A mix of emotions flashes across the man's face for a moment.{/n} "You and I are both bound by duty, {name}, and that takes precedence over any matters of the heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}一时间，种种复杂的感情从索罗蒙脸上一闪而过。{/n}“你我都受责任约束，{name}，这比一切感情问题都更重要。”

languages.text: {n}Für einen kurzen Moment huschen verschiedene Emotionen über das Gesicht des Mannes.{/n} "Wir sind beide an unsere Pflicht gebunden, {name}, und das ist wichtiger als alle Herzensangelegenheiten."
languages.original_text: {n}A mix of emotions flashes across the man's face for a moment.{/n} "You and I are both bound by duty, {name}, and that takes precedence over any matters of the heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}Für einen kurzen Moment huschen verschiedene Emotionen über das Gesicht des Mannes.{/n} "Wir sind beide an unsere Pflicht gebunden, {name}, und das ist wichtiger als alle Herzensangelegenheiten."

languages.text: {n}男の顔に一瞬、さまざまな感情が浮かぶ。{/n}"私もあなたも義務に縛られている。{name} 、それは心の問題よりも優先される。"
languages.original_text: {n}A mix of emotions flashes across the man's face for a moment.{/n} "You and I are both bound by duty, {name}, and that takes precedence over any matters of the heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}男の顔に一瞬、さまざまな感情が浮かぶ。{/n}"私もあなたも義務に縛られている。{name} 、それは心の問題よりも優先される。"
